definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: If tired, smell a whiff of clove oil and it will wake you up.
sentences.chinese: 如果疲倦，聞上一點丁香油將令人清醒。

sentences.english: But pure balm heals the festering wound.
sentences.chinese: 但純香油治癒感染的傷口。

sentences.english: In making this dish, we should use sesame oil instead of peanut oil.
sentences.chinese: 我們做這個菜時，用香油代替了花生油。

sentences.english: In the meantime, mixzinc oxide and oil of cloves into a white paste.
sentences.chinese: 同時，把氧化鋅和丁香油和成白色的膏。

sentences.english: Mysore sandalwood oil was renowned and considered superior to all other varieties.
sentences.chinese: 邁索爾檀香油是著名的，並認爲優於其他所有品種。

sentences.english: Ylang-ylang oil is made of ylang-ylang tree flowers and some other perfumed oils.
sentences.chinese: 而依蘭油是由依蘭樹花和其他一些芳香油製成的。

sentences.english: Neroli was once an oil heavily used in embalming those who were mummified in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 橙花曾是一種在古代大量用於給木乃伊塗香油的精油。

sentences.english: Clove oil has a numbing effect in addition to bacteria-fighting powers.
sentences.chinese: 除了殺菌作用，丁香油還有麻痹功效。

sentences.english: Litsea cubeba is a unique aromatic plant resource in China.
sentences.chinese: 山蒼子是中國特色芳香油植物資源之一。

sentences.english: Shroudthem, embalm them, cover themallover with tender pride.
sentences.chinese: 套罩，塗香油，替他們蓋上柔嫩的自尊。

sentences.english: High levels of drug aromatic oil can be extracted from the oil-water separator.
sentences.chinese: 可提取高含量的藥物芳香油，從油水分離器中取出。

sentences.english: Ginger and Vinegar, Garlic Sesame oil, Lemon Wedge, Tabasco.
sentences.chinese: 薑汁醋，香油大蒜汁，檸檬角，辣椒仔。

sentences.english: The spray drying technology conditions for the aniseed oil microencapsulation was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了茴香油噴霧乾燥微膠囊化的噴霧乾燥工藝。

sentences.english: The microcapsule of Clove Oil (CO) was prepared by utilizing dried beer yeast(S. cerevisiae) cell as wall materials.
sentences.chinese: 以乾啤酒酵母細胞爲壁材製備丁香油微膠囊。

sentences.english: The analytical results showed that aromatic hydrocarbons were the troublesome substances.
sentences.chinese: 分析結果表明產生異味的物質爲芳香油。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
